boxes.title: BabyBud Greenbox
boxes.description: 3 grams of flower, two 1-gram prerolls, and a pack of zig-zags papers.

boxes.title: MEDium Greenbox
boxes.description: 5 grams of flower, 3 1-gram prerolls, .5 grams of concentrate, and a pack of zig-zags papers.

boxes.title: BigBud Greenbox
boxes.description: 7 grams of flower, 5 1-gram prerolls, 3 grams of concentrate, and 2 packs of zig-zags papers.
